text:
Samuel Robert Johnson (October 11, 1930 – May 27, 2020) was an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for serving in Congress from 1991 to 2019. He was a member of the Republican Party.
On January 6, 2017, Johnson announced he will not run for reelection in 2018.
He was the last Korean War veteran to serve in Congress.
Johnson died at his home in Plano, Texas on May 27, 2020 of natural causes at the age of 89.
